Text: Thank you so much for this episode.  I, too, would really appreciate it if you had episodes 6 & 7.  Any others in the future would be great.

You can view episodes 6 & 7 on y.o.u.t.u.b.e in fireblaze825's channel. Each episode there is split into 5 parts.

Thanks to Redbird14 on m.i.n.i.n.o.v.a for providing this info.

Note: periods added to site names in case this is causing the database errors when I try to post the comment
Thank you so much for filling in the gap for  Heartland episodes.  Very much appreciated.
